name: read_artifact
description: Reads and returns the full content of a specific artifact from the Virtual File System (VFS).

path.description: The full VFS path of the artifact (e.g., '/modules/utils.js').

name: list_artifacts
description: Lists all available artifacts in the VFS, optionally filtered by a directory path.

path.description: Optional: The directory path to filter by (e.g., '/modules/').
